title: Sexist NYTimes Readers, Disney Sucks At Pet Sitting 10.23.17
itunes:title: Sexist NYTimes Readers, Disney Sucks At Pet Sitting 10.23.17
description:
In episode 11, Jack & Miles are joined by Daniel Van Kirk to discuss The Snowman, Lupita Nyong'o's NY Times Op Ed piece, a round up of the weeks tabloids, the Handsmade Tale coming to life, the iPhone 8's lack of sales, & more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
